# Korean E-commerce App - React Native Expo

## Project Overview
This is a React Native Expo e-commerce application for Korean products with complete theming, internationalization, and navigation structure. The project has been successfully created and is ready for development.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo (SDK 49)
- TypeScript
- React Navigation (Stack + Bottom Tabs)
- React-i18next for internationalization
- AsyncStorage for local storage

## Project Structure
```
src/
├── screens/          # All screen components (Splash, Onboarding, Auth, etc.)
├── components/       # Reusable UI components (Button, Input, ProductCard)
├── navigation/       # Navigation configuration (RootNavigator, MainTabNavigator)
├── theme/           # Theme and styling (ThemeProvider)
├── utils/           # Utility functions (i18n with locales)
├── services/        # API and external services
└── constants/       # App constants (theme, types)
```

## Color Palette
- Primary: #F8E9A1 (accent)
- Error/Sale: #F76C6C 
- Secondary: #A8D0E6
- Headers: #374785
- Background/Navigation: #24305E

## Features Implemented
✅ Complete project structure
✅ Dark/Light themes with ThemeProvider
✅ Multi-language support (Korean/English/Russian)
✅ Authentication flow (Login/Register/ForgotPassword)
✅ Onboarding screens
✅ Main navigation with bottom tabs
✅ Home screen with product display
✅ Search functionality
✅ Orders history screen
✅ Profile with settings
✅ Responsive UI components
✅ TypeScript types and interfaces

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow React Native best practices
- Implement responsive design
- Use modern, minimalist design approach
- Ensure accessibility compliance

## Getting Started
1. Navigate to project directory
2. Run `npm install` 
3. Run `npx expo start`
4. Scan QR code with Expo Go app or run on simulator

The project is now ready for further development and customization!
